author: fielding
msg: Remove note about HTTP status codes (done) and move the general
stuff in the postponed category back up to the general category.

author: fielding
msg: Added new HTTP status codes and default response bodies from the
HTTP Extension Framework (510) specifications.  Did not add the
WebDAV 424 and 425 codes because they are bogus.  We don't use any
of these codes yet, but they are now available to 3rd-party modules.

author: fielding
msg: The ScriptAlias line was accidentally uncommented by Wilfredo's patch.

author: fielding
msg: Fix a possible race condition between timed-out requests and the
ap_bhalfduplex select that might result in an infinite loop on
platforms that do not validate the descriptor.

author: martin
msg: Rain everywhere in germany. Let's get 1.3.3 rolling, folks!
